about_the_game:
Sheba: A New Dawn an Action-RPG Metroidvania that will take you on a journey like no other. Explore a vast world full of mysteries, challenges, and captivating storyline filled with twists and turns.

Story

Enar, a humble shepherd, finds his world turned upside down when the jinn prisoner named Mirah escapes, and the tides of fate begin to shift. It is her escape that sets off a chain of events that will lead Enar on a dangerous journey to regain control and unravel the mysteries of his world. As he embarks on this epic adventure, Enar will discover his true destiny as the hero of a new dawn. With action, danger, and uncertainty lurking at every turn, Enar battles to restore balance and save his world from certain doom, with Mirah playing a pivotal role in his quest. Get ready for an unforgettable journey as Enar and Mirah work together to change the fate of their world.

World

Long before the maps of today were drawn, humanity bordered upon lands strange and bright, filled with wondrous creatures and peoples beyond imagining. In the ancient realm of Sheba, the line between myth and reality blurs, as humans and jinn clash in a never-ending struggle for dominance. With the fate of the kingdom hanging in the balance, prepare for a journey into the unknown, where danger and adventure lurk around every corner. Discover the secrets of this mystical land, as you explore its ancient ruins, battle fearsome foes, and unravel the mysteries of a world where anything is possible.

Key Features:


  • 45+ Combo skills and elemental combo finishers: be stylish by using various skills and combos with each different elemental sword to enjoy your battles ahead!


  • Iconic and memorable characters: Each character has a vital role in the story which you will never forget!
  • Story and cutscenes: Enjoy the fully voice casted compelling story!


  • 67+ unique Jinn and bosses: each Jinn and boss are inspired by nature and mythical stories. They have their own strategic fighting styles which will reward you with unique collectables to power your journey!


  • Unique puzzles: Mind games are set by the Jinn to prevent adventurers from unlocking the secrets of the world.


  • Collect various power ups and abilities: Enjoy your journey through secret places in the world of Sheba to unlock new abilities and grind rare gems to become more powerful to beat your foes.


  • Different environments: The land of Sheba is filled with distinct places to explore and discover.


  • Customize your fighting style with RPG elements: Level up your character to increase your stats and play the game the way you like!
